verbose_text: This aims to restore homeostasis within the ER lumen by; (i) reducing the burden on the folding machinery through limiting the number of new polypeptide chains entering the ER lumen, (ii) increasing the capacity of the machinery by synthesising more ER, (iii) generating more chaperone proteins, and (iv) removing accumulated misfolded proteins through stimulation of the ER associated proteosomal degradation pathway (ERAD).
